verse.lines: {lang-eng}All for Jesus all for Jesus Let my lips speak forth His praise All for Jesus all for Jesus Let my lips speak forth His praise{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All for Jesus all for Jesus All my being's ransomed pow'rs All my thoughts and words and doings All my days and all my hours{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Let my hands perform His bidding Let my feet run in His ways Let my eyes see Jesus only Let my lips speak forth His praise{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Worldlings prize their gems of beauty Cling to gilded toys of dust Boast of wealth and fame and pleasure Only Jesus will I trust{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Since mine eyes were fixed on Jesus I've lost sight of all beside So enchained my spirit's vision Looking at the Crucified{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O what wonder how amazing Jesus glorious King of kings Deigns to call me His beloved Lets me rest beneath His wings{/lang-eng}
